Faux-soul

A faux-soul is a construct of pure Mana which, within the confines of the Creation within which the rules allow for it, mimics certain behaviours of a soul. Such a construct may be self-sustaining, may need to feed upon some source of Mana, or may be fueled by some other willing entity - often with command over it. They may be somewhat autonomous, but exhibit only basic instincts and behaviours, often failing even to move any bound vessel in a dextrous manner. Example applications of faux-souls include Undead, constructs, and homunculi, though these may also be imbued with genuine souls.

Sometimes, faux-souls may also be used to imprison and manipulate the behaviour of a real soul, often resulting in beings which behave like a twisted version of imprisoned soul, such as most intelligent Undead.

Faux Souls in Marlien

Faux Souls in the Creation Marlien are a construction of Negative Energy.
